pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Windows Package Manager (aka. WinGet) 默认软件源。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"修改 WinGet 软件源需要管理员权限，请以管理员身份运行终端。"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"winget--18","children":"WinGet >= 1.8"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"用以下命令替换 winget 源："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"winget source remove winget
winget source add winget {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} --trust-level trusted","codeLanguage":"powershell"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"winget--17","children":"WinGet <= 1.7"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"用以下命令替换 winget 源："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"winget source remove winget
winget source add winget {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}","codeLanguage":"powershell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若出现 0x80073d1b : smartscreen reputation check failed. 错误，请检查网络连接或暂时关闭 SmartScreen。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"重置与故障排除","children":"重置与故障排除"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如需重置为官方地址，执行以下命令即可："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"winget source reset winget","language":"powershell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果出现错误："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"Operation failed: Windows 无法安装程序包 Microsoft.Winget.Source……因为它的版本为 xxx。已安装此程序包的更高版本 yyy。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"那么说明镜像站的 WinGet 版本暂时低于官方源，可以使用以下命令移除更高版本的源："}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"Get-AppxPackage Microsoft.Winget.Source | Remove-AppPackage","language":"powershell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"winget update"}]," 之后，被删除的源会自动重新安装。"]}]]}]

meta.title: WinGet 软件仓库索引镜像使用帮助
